item.description:
Location: MassBio, One Cambridge Center, 9th Floor, Cambridge

You are cordially invited to our Membership Open House!

Thursday, February 10th, 2011 at MassBio
One Cambridge Center, Cambridge MA 02142



4:00 p.m. -4:15 p.m. - Registration and networking
4:15 p.m.-4:45 p.m. - Presentation by MassBio team
4:45 p.m.-5:30 p.m. - Reception


Learn how to maximize your MassBio membership:

Make sure you are taking advantage of our Purchasing Consortium
Learn more about MassBio Committees and Signature Events
Connect with our Economic Development and Public Policy services
Network with other MassBio members
Talk one-on-one with the MassBio team to get your questions or concerns addressed

Please reserve your spot by Friday, February 4, 2011.
item.name: MassBio Membership Open House
